name: BTS TAEKOOK GAME
description:
BTS TAEKOOK GAME

INSTRUCTIONS:

  • TAEHYUNG (the player) needs to steal JUNGKOOK'S banana milk without him noticing.
  • Control TAEHYUNG'S motion using the arrow keys:

UP:   STOP

LEFT:   LEFT

RIGHT:    RIGHT

AVOID JUNGKOOK AT ALL COSTS!! OR JUNGKOOK WILL KICK TAEHYUNG.

BANANA MILK WILL INCREASE TAEHYUNG'S LIFE.

ONCE ALL THE LIVES ARE OVER JUNKOOK WILL KICK TAEHYUNG TO THE NEXT UNIVERSE.

ENJOY!!
